title: Dept Members - View More button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Members page
AND there are more than 8 contacts in the department
AND the View More button appears at the bottom
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the View More button
custom_expected: THEN 8 more contact cards appear on the page

title: Dept Members - Link to profile page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Department's Members page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the name or image of a contact card
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to a profile page
AND the profile breadcrumb is present at the top of the page.

title: Message Board appearance for non-member
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department's Message Board
AND user is not a member of the Department
custom_expected:
THEN the Banned Users option in the top nav is not visible
AND the Permissions button is not visible

title: Message Board - select message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department's Message Board
AND table of messages has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a message title
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the correct message.

title: Message Board - Post New Thread
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Message Board
AND Post New Thread button has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Post New Thread button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Add Message page
AND the page looks like the photos below:

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19900)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19901)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19902)

title: Message Board - Post New Thread - Publish button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating a new message
AND the Add Message page displays the Publish button
custom_steps:
WHEN user makes entries in all required fields
AND user clicks or taps on the Publish button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to a message page
AND all of the information on the message page is what the user entered

title: Message Board - Post New Thread - different locations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is creating a new message
custom_steps: WHEN user publishes the new message
custom_expected:
THEN the message appears on the Department Message Board page
AND the document appears on the Department Home page in the Message Board section
AND permissions rules apply (see other test cases).

title: Message Board - Add Category
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND the Add Category button appears
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Add Category button
custom_expected:
THEN the Add Category modal opens
AND user can create the Category

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19909)

title: Message Board - Move message into category
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND categories and messages appear
custom_steps: WHEN user moves a message into a category
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to the message's individual page

AND WHEN user navigates back to the Message Board
THEN message is not visible

AND WHEN user selects the category
THEN the message is visible and clickable.

title: Message Board - Permissions function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown link
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Permissions
custom_expected:
THEN the Permissions popup appears
AND user can select or de-select checkboxes
AND user can select Save or Cancel

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19903)

title: Message Board - Permissions - Public
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown link
AND user has selected the Permissions option
AND the Permissions popup has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects View for Guest
AND user navigates back to the Message Board
custom_expected: THEN users who are not members of the Department can see the message

title: Message Board - Permissions - Department Only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown link
AND user has selected the Permissions option
AND the Permissions popup has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user de-selects View for Guest
AND user navigates back to the Message Board
custom_expected: THEN users who are not members of the Department cannot see it

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Message Board breadcrumb
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the Department's Message Board.

title: New Blog Post - publish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating a new blog post
AND the Add Post page displays the Publish button
custom_steps:
WHEN user makes entries in all required fields
AND user clicks or taps on the Publish button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to that Department's Blog page with all the blog posts visible
AND the newly created post appears
AND all of the information is what the user entered

title: New Blog Post - Featured
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is creating a new Blog Post
AND the Add Post modal is open
custom_steps:
WHEN user taps or clicks on the Select button beneath MLB (Global)
AND the Categories modal appears
AND user taps or clicks on Featured
AND user clicks or taps on the X to close that modal
AND user completes the rest of the new post
AND user selects Publish
AND user navigates to the Main Page of the site
custom_expected:
THEN the new blog post appears under Featured Blog Posts on the Main Page
AND all the information matches the data the user entered

[This function will only work if there are less than 3 posts in the Featured section -- a max of 4 are visible]

title: New Blog Post - different locations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created opened an Add Blog Post modal
custom_steps: WHEN user publishes a new Blog Post
custom_expected:
THEN the post appears on the Department Blog page
AND the post appears on the Department Home page under Latest Blog Posts
AND the post appears on the Main Page under Featured Blog Posts (IF user selected Featured and IF there were fewer than 3 Featured posts already)
AND permissions rules apply (see other test cases).

title: New Blog Post - Public permission
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is creating a new Blog Post
AND the Add Post modal is open
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects Anyone (Guest Role) from the "Viewable by" dropdown menu
AND user completes the rest of the post
AND user clicks or taps Publish
custom_expected:
THEN the new post appears on the Dept Blog
AND the new post appears on the Dept Home page
AND the new post appears on the Main Page (if Featured was selected and there was room)
AND users who are not members of the Department can see the post in all of those locations
AND users who are not members of the Department can select the post and be redirected to the individual post page
 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19425)

title: New Blog Post - Dept Only permission
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is creating a new Blog Post
AND the Add Post modal is open
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects Site Members from the "Viewable by" dropdown menu
AND user completes the rest of the post
AND user clicks or taps Publish
custom_expected:
THEN only users who are members of the Department can see the new post in these locations: Dept Blog page, Dept Home page, Main Page Featured Chatter (if applicable)
AND only users who are members of the Department can see the post's individual page
AND users who are not members of the Department cannot see it

title: Blog Post page - edit

AND user is on an individual Blog Post page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Edit button
custom_expected:

AND it looks like the Add Post modal
AND the modal is pre-populated with all the data entered when the chatter was created
AND the Permissions section is not visible
AND user can change or add information and select Publish
AND the post will show the changes.

title: Dept Bookmarks - move bookmark folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmarks page
AND user selects the 3-dot dropdown for a bookmark folder
AND dropdown menu appears
AND Move is an item in the dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Move
custom_expected:
THEN the Move modal appears
AND user can select another folder to move the bookmark folder into

AND WHEN user selects the Move button
THEN the first bookmark folder can be found within the second, selected folder.

title: Dept Bookmarks - Permissions: Public bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a bookmark
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Anyone"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can see and select the bookmark
AND a user who IS a member of the Departmentcan see and select the bookmark.

title: Dept Bookmarks - Permissions: Dept Only bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a bookmark
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Site Members"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can NOT see and select the bookmark
AND a user who IS a member of the Department CAN see and select the bookmark.

title: Dept Bookmarks - Permissions: Public folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a bookmark folder
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Anyone"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can see and select the bookmark folder
AND a user who IS a member of the Department can see and select the bookmark folder.

title: Dept Bookmarks - Permissions: Dept Only folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a bookmark folder
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Site Members"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can NOT see and select the bookmark folder
AND a user who IS a member of the Department CAN see and select the bookmark folder.

title: Dept Bookmarks - permissions - change Public to Dept Only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmarks page
AND user selects a bookmark's 3-dot dropdown link
OR user selects a folder's 3-dot dropdown link
AND dropdown menu has appeared
AND Permissions appears in the dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Permissions
custom_expected:
THEN the Permissions popup appears

AND WHEN user de-selects checkboxes for Guest
AND user selects Save
AND user closes out of the modal
THEN the item can only be seen by Department members

title: Dept Bookmarks - permissions - change Department Only to Public
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmarks page
AND user selects a bookmark's 3-dot dropdown link
OR user selects a folder's 3-dot dropdown link
AND dropdown menu has appeared
AND Permissions appears in the dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Permissions
custom_expected:
THEN the Permissions popup appears

AND WHEN user selects View and Subscribe checkboxes for Guest 
AND user selects Save
AND user closes out of the modal
THEN the item can be viewed by anyone

title: Dept Bookmarks - delete bookmark - undo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmark page
AND user has sent a bookmark to the Recycling Bin
AND the Recycling Bin popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Undo button
custom_expected: THEN the bookmark reappears in the table of bookmarks

title: Dept Bookmarks - delete bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmarks page
AND user has selected a bookmark's 3-dot dropdown
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the item: Move to the Recycle Bin
custom_expected:
THEN the bookmark disappears from the table of bookmarks
AND a popup appears that offers an Undo option

title: Dept Bookmarks - delete bookmark folder - undo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmark page
AND user has sent a folder to the Recycling Bin
AND the Recycling Bin popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Undo button
custom_expected: THEN the folder reappears in the list

title: Dept Bookmarks - delete bookmark folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Bookmarks page
AND user has selected a folder's 3-dot dropdown
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the item: Move to the Recycle Bin
custom_expected:
THEN the folder disappears from the list
AND a popup appears that offers the Undo option

title: Space Bookmarks - create bookmark
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Space's Bookmarks page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Add Bookmark
AND user completes required fields in modal
custom_expected:
THEN bookmark is created
AND bookmark redirects to the correct website.

title: Space Bookmarks - create bookmark folder
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Space's Bookmarks page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on Add Folder
AND user completes required fields in the modal
custom_expected: THEN bookmarks folder is created.

title: Space Bookmarks - edit bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on the Space Bookmarks page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on a bookmark's 3-dot dropdown link
AND user clicks or taps on the Edit option
custom_expected:
THEN the Edit Bookmark modal appears
AND it looks like the photos below
AND the modal is pre-populated with all the data entered when the bookmark was created
AND user can change or add information and select Save
AND the bookmark will show the changes.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19923)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19924)

title: Space Bookmarks - edit bookmark folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a creator of a bookmarks folder
AND user is on the Space Bookmarks page
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects that folder's 3-dot dropdown
AND user selects the Edit item in the dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN the edit page appears
AND data is pre-populated
AND user can enter changes

AND WHEN user selects Save
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space Bookmarks page
AND the folder shows a different title if that was changed.

title: Space Bookmarks - move bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on that Space Bookmarks page
AND user selects the 3-dot dropdown for a bookmark
AND dropdown menu appears
AND Move is an item in the dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Move
custom_expected:
THEN the Move modal appears
AND user can select a folder to move the bookmark into

AND WHEN user selects the Move button
THEN the bookmark can be found within the folder that was selected.
